mapper.select: SELECT LEVEL-1 AS ACCOUNT_LEVEL ,CONNECT_BY_ISLEAF AS LEAF , ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE , PARENT_ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE , ACCOUNT_CODE , ACCOUNT_CHARACTER , ACCOUNT_NAME , ACCOUNT_DISPLAY_NAME_WITH_CODE , ACCOUNT_DISPLAY_NAME , ACCOUNT_DIVISION , ACCOUNT_USE_CHECK , ACCOUNT_DESCRIPTION FROM ACCOUNT START WITH PARENT_ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE = PARENT_ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE
SELECT ACCOUNT_PERIOD_NO FROM PERIOD WHERE #{toDay} BETWEEN PERIOD_START_DATE AND PERIOD_END_DATE

SELECT ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE, PARENT_ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE, ACCOUNT_CODE, ACCOUNT_CHARACTER, ACCOUNT_NAME, ACCOUNT_DIVISION, ACCOUNT_USE_CHECK, ACCOUNT_DESCRIPTION, EDITABLE from ACCOUNT WHERE PARENT_ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE IS not NULL
AND ACCOUNT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{accountName} || '%'
AND ACCOUNT_CODE LIKE '%' || #{accountCode} || '%'

SELECT ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE, PARENT_ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE, ACCOUNT_CODE, ACCOUNT_CHARACTER, ACCOUNT_NAME, ACCOUNT_DIVISION, ACCOUNT_USE_CHECK, ACCOUNT_DESCRIPTION, EDITABLE FROM ACCOUNT WHERE ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE LIKE '%-%' AND ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE not IN ('0101-0175', '0176-0250') AND PARENT_ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE IS not NULL ORDER BY ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE
SELECT * from ACCOUNT WHERE ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE not LIKE '%-%' AND PARENT_ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE = #{code} ORDER BY ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE

SELECT ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE, PARENT_ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE, ACCOUNT_CODE, ACCOUNT_CHARACTER, ACCOUNT_NAME, ACCOUNT_DIVISION, ACCOUNT_USE_CHECK, ACCOUNT_DESCRIPTION, EDITABLE FROM ACCOUNT
ACCOUNT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{accountName} || '%'
AND ACCOUNT_CODE NOT LIKE '%-%'
order by ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE

SELECT D.ACCOUNT_CONTROL_CODE, ACCOUNT_CONTROL_NAME, ACCOUNT_CONTROL_TYPE, DESCRIPTION FROM ACCOUNT_CONTROL_CODE C, ACCOUNT_CONTROL_DETAIL D WHERE C.ACCOUNT_CODE = #{accountCode} AND C.ACCOUNT_CONTROL_CODE = D.ACCOUNT_CONTROL_CODE
SELECT * FROM ACCOUNT WHERE ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE NOT LIKE '%-%' AND PARENT_ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE = #{code} AND BUDGET='T' ORDER BY ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE

SELECT * FROM ACCOUNT WHERE ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE LIKE '%-%' AND ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE NOT IN ('0101-0175','0176-0250') AND PARENT_ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE IS NOT NULL AND account_inner_code IN (SELECT DISTINCT parent_account_inner_code FROM ACCOUNT WHERE ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE NOT LIKE '%-%' AND budget='T' ) ORDER BY ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE
SELECT SUBSTR(PERIOD_START_DATE,1,4) FISCAL_YEAR , ACCOUNT_PERIOD_NO , WORKPLACE_CODE , PERIOD_START_DATE , PERIOD_END_DATE FROM PERIOD
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNT ( ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE, PARENT_ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE, ACCOUNT_CODE, ACCOUNT_CHARACTER, ACCOUNT_NAME, ACCOUNT_USE_CHECK, ACCOUNT_DIVISION, ACCOUNT_DESCRIPTION, GROUP_CODE, EDITABLE, STATUS ) VALUES( #{accountInnerCode}, #{parentAccountInnercode}, #{accountCode}, #{accountCharacter}, #{accountName}, #{accountUseCheck}, #{accountDivision}, #{accountDescription}, #{groupCode}, #{editable}, #{status} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT SET ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE = #{accountInnerCode}, PARENT_ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE = #{parentAccountInnercode}, ACCOUNT_CODE = #{accountCode}, ACCOUNT_CHARACTER = #{accountCharacter}, ACCOUNT_NAME = #{accountName}, ACCOUNT_USE_CHECK = #{accountUseCheck}, ACCOUNT_DIVISION = #{accountDivision}, ACCOUNT_DESCRIPTION = #{accountDescription}, GROUP_CODE = #{groupCode}, EDITABLE = #{editable}, STATUS = #{status} WHERE ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE = #{accountInnerCode}
mapper.select: SELECT ACCOUNT_NAME ,ACCOUNT_CODE FROM ACCOUNT WHERE group_code='2.비유동자산' AND account_name != '사용자설정계정과목' AND account_name != '감가상각누계액'
